facelet-taglib:
http://plivo-java-ee.org/plivo-java-ee pj
conference The Conference element is used for starting a conference and callers can then join in to talk to others connected to that room.
conference
muted false Allowed Values:true,false. Default Value:false java.lang.String
enterSound false Allowed Values:'', 'beep:1', 'beep:2' or a valid URL. Default Value:'' java.lang.String
exitSound false Allowed Values:'', 'beep:1', 'beep:2' or a valid URL. Default Value:'' java.lang.String
startConferenceOnEnter false Allowed Values:true,false. Default Value:true java.lang.String
endConferenceOnExit false Allowed Values:true,false. Default Value:false java.lang.String
stayAlone false Allowed Values:true,false. Default Value:true java.lang.String
waitSound false Allowed Values:absolute URL.Default Value:No Music java.lang.String
maxMembers false Allowed Values:Any integer > 0 and <= 200. Default Value:200 java.lang.String
record false Allowed Values:true,false. Default Value:false java.lang.String
recordFileFormat false Allowed Values:mp3 or wav. Default Value:mp3 java.lang.String
timeLimit false Allowed Values:Any integer >= 0. Default Value:0 java.lang.String
hangupOnStar false Allowed Values:true,false. Default Value:false java.lang.String
action false Allowed Values:absolute URL. Default Value:no default action for Conference java.lang.String
method false Allowed Values:GET, POST. Default Value:POST java.lang.String
callbackUrl false Allowed Values:absolute URL. Default Value:none java.lang.String
callbackMethod false Allowed Values:GET, POST. Default Value:POST java.lang.String
digitsMatch false Allowed Values:List of digits patterns separated by comma. Default Value:none java.lang.String
floorEvent false Allowed Values:true,false. Default Value:false java.lang.String
redirect false Allowed Values:true,false. Default Value:false java.lang.String
transcriptionType false Allowed Values:auto - hybrid. Default Value:auto java.lang.String
transcriptionUrl false Allowed Values:absolute URL. Default Value:none java.lang.String
transcriptionMethod false Allowed Values:GET, POST. Default Value:GET java.lang.String
relayDTMF false Allowed Values:true, false. Default Value:true java.lang.String
dial The Dial element is used for dialing a single number or multiple numbers.
dial
action false Allowed Values:absolute URL. Default Value:no default action for Dial java.lang.String
method false Allowed Values:GET, POST. Default Value:POST java.lang.String
hangupOnStar false Allowed Values:true, false. Default Value:False java.lang.String
timeLimit false Allowed Values:positive integer(in seconds). Default Value:14400 seconds(4 hours) java.lang.String
timeout false Allowed Values:positive integer (seconds). Default Value:none java.lang.String
callerId false Allowed Values:valid phone number. Default Value:Current caller's callerId java.lang.String
callerName false Allowed Values:String or default. Default Value:Caller's callerName java.lang.String
confirmSound false Allowed Values:absolute URL. Default Value:empty java.lang.String
confirmKey false Allowed Values:any digit, #, *. Default Value:empty java.lang.String
dialMusic false Allowed Values:absolute URL. Default Value:empty java.lang.String
callbackUrl false Allowed Values:absolute URL. Default Value:empty java.lang.String
callbackMethod false Allowed Values:GET, POST. Default Value:POST java.lang.String
redirect false Allowed Values:true, false. Default Value:true java.lang.String
digitsMatch false Allowed Values:List of digit patterns separated by comma. Default Value:empty java.lang.String
sipHeaders false Allowed Values:List of SIP headers to send, separated by commas. key=value. Default Value:None java.lang.String
dmtf The DTMF element is used to send digits from the current call.
enqueue
async Allowed Values:true,false. Default true false java.lang.String
getDigits The GetDigits element is used to collect the digits entered by a caller.
getDigits
action false Allowed Values:absolute URL. Default Value:none java.lang.String
method false Allowed Values:GET, POST. Default Value:POST java.lang.String
timeout false Allowed Values:positive integer. Default Value:5 seconds java.lang.String
digitTimeout false Allowed Values:positive integer. Default Value:2 seconds java.lang.String
finishOnKey false Allowed Values:any digit, #, *. Default Value:# java.lang.String
numDigits false Allowed Values:integer >= 1. Default Value:99 java.lang.String
retries false Allowed Values:integer >= 1. Default Value:1 java.lang.String
redirect false Allowed Values:true,false. Default Value:true java.lang.String
playBeep false Allowed Values:true,false. Default Value:false java.lang.String
validDigits false Allowed Values:any digit, #, *. Default Value:1234567890*# java.lang.String
invalidDigitsSound false Allowed Values:Any remote sound file URL (mp3 or wav). Default Value:none java.lang.String
log false Allowed Values:true, false. Default Value:true java.lang.String
hangup The Hangup element is used to end a call.
hangup
reason true Allowed Values:rejected, busy. Default Value:none java.lang.String
schedule true Allowed Values:nteger > 0 (in seconds). Default Value:none java.lang.String
Message Number Play PreAnswer Record Redirect Speak User Wait
